1983 | Vivement dimanche ! | Confidentially Yours | François Truffaut
1984 | Viva la vie ! |  | Claude Lelouch
1984 | Péril en la demeure | Death in a French Garden | Michel Deville

1985 | Subway | Subway | Luc Besson

1986 | Jean de Florette | Jean de Florette | Claude Berri
1986 | Manon des Sources | Manon of the Spring | Claude Berri

wiki_section_text: 

intro: The following is a list of French-language films, films mostly spoken in the French language.

qa.question: Which actress was sister of the director of the 1980 French-language film La Boum ?

It does not mention any information related to films, actresses, directors, or the movie 'La Boum'.
